body_html: @apaszke - On a related note, are there plans to have implicit casting for operations, like LongTensor + FloatTensor = FloatTensor. For many pyro models, samples from one distribution would go as parameters to another one. So for instance, we might sample a FloatTensor from a Categorical and provide these as counts to a Binomial distribution. This will need a type_as on both ends. It would be great if PyTorch had some implicit casting that would allow for this.
